all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
And again, verily I say unto you, O inhabitants of the earth: I the Lord am willing to make these things known unto all flesh;
Doctrine and Covenants 1:34
Quote of the Day
"The Savior achieved a perfect and divine level of submission to the Father by allowing His will to be swallowed up in the Father’s will."
Ulisses Soares | 1 Oct 2024General Conference
